statements: SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name FROM order_fulfillment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, customer_name, order_status FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_status = 'delivered';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, quantity FROM order_fulfillment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM order_fulfillment GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_status = 'shipped';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM order_fulfillment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, customer_name, quantity FROM order_fulfillment WHERE order_status = 'pending' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_status FROM order_fulfillment WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name, quantity, order_status FROM order_fulfillment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Order;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount, order_date FROM Order;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM Order ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Order WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Order_Items;
SELECT * FROM Order WHERE order_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Order WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT order_id, SUM(price*quantity) AS total_price FROM Order_Items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_price > 1000;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Order_Items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Order WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Order;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Order;
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM OrderItems;
SELECT product_id, quantity_available, last_updated FROM Inventory;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Order WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Order;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Order WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Order ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM Order;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, price FROM OrderItems JOIN Inventory ON OrderItems.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders LIMIT 5
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM Products WHERE price >= 50.00
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, subtotal FROM OrderItems ORDER BY subtotal DESC
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '(555)%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Products.product_name, OrderItems.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, status, last_updated FROM Fulfillment_Status WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM Order_Items WHERE quantity < 5;
